title: The inferno that transformed American labor
itunes:author: American Public Media
description:
The aftermath of the Triangle Shirtwaist Factory fire helped usher in higher wages, safer conditions and a prohibition on child labor. But the problems that led to the fire havenâ€™t gone away. Not even close.
